medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric and right upper quadrant pain, accompanied by nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports pain since a few days before the visit. The pain radiates to her back. She has been treated for cholelithiasis and pancreatitis, initially admitted for observation and treated with IV Cefoxitin and Demerol.
medical_history.past_medical_history: MRSA wound culture; past surgical history includes I&D of perirectal abscess.
medical_history.family_history: Mother and grandmother with gallstones, both underwent cholecystectomy.
